column3: My all-time favorite one is the Civil War, but I'm curious about other fellows' opinion. So this is the time, when you should choose a favorite.
I did not have time for all the movies yet, but maybe you can advise me something, which I should definitely watch! Which films do you like and I would understand the storyline?

column2: Who is the best MCU villain?
column3: For me Thanos is like a GOD! I'm really curious about the coming Infinity War!!! Who is your favorite, guys?
I just finished the Civil War comic books and wondering that which superhero was right or which is cooler. What do you think guys? I am with Cap, I guess.

column2: What do you think about Thanos's pinkness?
column3: He's kinda weird in the Infinity War, but I'm would like to see him more in the screen. I think Brolin is an excellent choice, but with pink head idk...but even him would be lame.

column2: Which comic book would you like to see on the screen?
column3: Last time I really wanted to see the Mad Love in some movie and here we go...Suicid Squad is such a shame. So I finished with DC comics on screen, but Civil War was awesome. Which is your favorite connection between the comic and movie scene?

column2: Did you ever read a comic book?
column3: I never had time for it, but maybe I would start some in the new year. What about you? Do you have more time to read?

I am curious about this topic. For instance because he is my favorite character in the comic universe, but on the other hand I'm a bit afraid what could be in the new film's script. You know...for the writers he is just a villain. So what do you think?

column2: Which heroes will die in the Infinity War?
column3: The new trailer is really awesome and I just watch it again and again. What about you, geek fellows? Did you like it? Who will die in the new movie? I'm definitely about Captain America's destiny, but I hope that it won't be reasonless.

column2: What do you think about the Grandmaster?
column3: I don't know why, but I just love the hilarious act from Jeff Goldblum. He is so funny and just sparkles in this charatcter. I mean it really looks like he enjoyed working with the crew.
I love them both, but maybe the first one was way more classic-style, then the second. Both amazing though!
